quran: In the name of God, the Almighty, the Merciful.
By the night when it covers,
and by the day when it appears,
and by what He has created - the male and female -
your works are varied.
As for he who gives, and is righteous,
and trusts in goodness:
We will provide him with an easy path.
While he who hoards, considering himself independent,
rejecting righteousness:
We will provide him with a path to misery,
and his wealth will not avail him when he perishes.
It is for Us to guide,
and onto Us is the end, and all before it.
I have warned you of an inferno;
none will end up there, except the wicked -
the one who denies and turns away.
The righteous will be spared -
the one who donates his money, purifying himself,
seeking nothing in return
besides seeking the pleasure of His Lord - the Most High -
and he will certainly be content.
